author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove obsolete class from Validation/HGCalValidation. FastTime was used to initiate fast timing code which is now taken over by MTD. This is an obsolete class and we are in the process of cleaning up the obsolete classes no longer used.

#### PR validation:

No other code depends on this

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-329A Remove obsolete class from Validation/HGCalValidation
